sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default class OrderDetail extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ orderdetail:[], orderplacer:{} } } orderid = this.props.match.params.id componentDidMount(){ fetch("/orderdetail/"+this.props.match.params.id+"") .then((res)=>res.json()) .then(rows => this.setState({orderdetail: rows})) fetch("/orderplacerdetail/"+this.props.match.params.id+"") .then((res)=>res.json()) .then(rows => this.setState({orderplacer: rows[0]})) } render(){ return(
Ma Don Hang: #{this.state.orderplacer.orderid}
Trang Thai Don Hang: {(this.state.orderplacer.orderstatus === "Done") ? Order Success : (this.state.orderplacer.orderstatus === "Undone") ? Order Processing : Canceled }
Thoi Gian Dat Hang: {this.state.orderplacer.timeorder}
Thong tin dat hang
Nguoi dat hang: {this.state.orderplacer.name}
Dia Chi: {this.state.orderplacer.address}
So Dien thoai: {this.state.orderplacer.phone}
Hinh thuc thanh toan
Thanh Toan Tien Mat
Tong gia tri don hang
Tong Tien(Truoc Giam Gia): {this.state.orderplacer.total + " VND"}
Giam Gia: {this.state.orderplacer.promotion +" VND"}
Tong Tien(Phai Thanh Toan): {this.state.orderplacer.total - this.state.orderplacer.promotion +" VND"}
{this.state.orderdetail.map((product)=> )}
Mon An Gia So luong Tong Cong
{product.productname} {product.price+" VND"} {product.quantity} {product.totalprice + " VND"}
) } }
